verses.1: Topa lian a, i Pasianʼ khuapi sungah nakpi takin phat ding ahi hi.
verses.2: Kumpi lianpaʼ khuapi, leilu lam a a om ama mual siangtho hoihin a sang mahmah Zion mual pen leitung khempeuhʼ lungdamna ahi hi.
verses.3: A muanhuai tua mualah amah a hu taktak pa ahihna Pasian in a lak khin hi.
verses.4: Ahi zongin, kumpite kikaikhawmin, a sim dingin hong kuan khawm uh hi.
verses.5: Amaute in Zion a muh phetun lamdang sa mahmah uh a, dipkua vatin tai uh hi.
verses.6: Numei nausuak na a sa bangin amaute liing gawp uh hi.
verses.7: Nisuahna huihpi tawh Tarshish kici teembaw liante nang na susia hi.
verses.8: Ka zak sa bangun Vanglian Topaʼ khuapi, i Pasianʼ khuapi, Pasian in a phuhkip ngitngetna ka mu khin uh hi.
verses.9: Pasian aw, na biakinn sungah nangma itna kip ka ngaihsun uh hi.
verses.10: Pasian aw, na min in leimong dong a zelh bangin, nangmah hong kiphatna in zong a zel hi. Na taklam khut gualzawhna tawh a kidim hi.
verses.11: Zion Mual lungdamsak in. Na thukhenna hangin Judah mite lungdamsak in.
verses.12: Hih pen eima Pasian hi a, a tawntungin eima Pasian hi, ci-in khangkikte tungah na gen theih nadingun Zion kiimvelin pai-in, a tausang phazah sim unla, a kulh phungmai a hoih mahmahte ngaihsunin, a phualpi muanhuaite va nawk kim un. Amah pen a tawntungin lam hong lak ding pa ahi hi.
